description:
Karara and Chiroro show up again, intent on winning Keroro`s heart!  But Tamama cannot bear that, and Mois-chan is hurt that they are even trying.  Pururu shows up to save the day, but maybe she is not as helpful as they all think, either!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, War Is a Big Scramble
ケロロ 争奪大戦争
